title: STUMPED  Speech Practice Platform v1 Specification
content:
# STUMPED Speech Practice Platform v1

## Core Features

### Web Interface
- Text area for speech input (2000 char max)
- Start/Stop button
- Current interruption display box
- Simple status indicator (Ready/Speaking/Interrupted)
- Basic timer display

### AI Interruption System

1. Interruption Types
   - Questions ("What do you mean by X?", "Can you explain Y?")
   - Objections ("That's incorrect because...", "I disagree with...")
   - Distractions ("*cough*", "Your time is running out", "*phone ringing*")

2. Timing Rules
   - First interruption after 30 seconds minimum
   - 30-120 seconds between interruptions
   - Maximum 5 interruptions per session
   - Session length: 5 minutes maximum

### User Flow
1. User enters/pastes speech text
2. System validates text length
3. User clicks Start
4. Timer begins counting
5. AI generates interruptions based on speech content
6. Session ends at 5 minutes or Stop button

## Technical Implementation

### Frontend
- React + Vite
- Single page design
- No user accounts needed
- Local storage for speech text

### Backend
- Node.js + Express
- GPT-3.5 for interruption generation
- Basic rate limiting
- Error handling

## V1 Limitations
- Text-only interruptions
- No audio recording
- Single difficulty level
- No user accounts
- No progress tracking
- English only

## Future Features (v2+)
- Audio recording
- Multiple difficulty levels
- Performance tracking
- Custom scenarios
- Multi-language support
